data.eml:eml: Four new species of Tremella (Tremellales, Basidiomycota) based on morphology and DNA sequence data

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhao, Ying, Liu, Xin-zhan, Bai, Feng-yan (2019): Four new species of Tremella (Tremellales, Basidiomycota) based on morphology and DNA sequence data. MycoKeys 47: 75-95, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.47.29180, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.47.29180
